item.description:
Love Obama? Like to party? Let's party for Obama!

To celebrate, we will be watching the evening's inauguration events on a huge projector screen. Please bring your own booze and snacks [either personal or to be shared - your choice!]. If bringing shared snacks, please post what you are bringing in your RSVP.

I will e-mail Ted's address and parking information the day before the party.

This event is guest-hosted by Ted and Lisa.
item.name: Obama Inauguration Celebration
